tools.name: GenProg
tools.description: Automated program repair tool based on genetic programming
tools.title: A Systematic Study of Automated Program Repair: Fixing 55 out of 105 bugs for $8 Each
tools.authors: C. Le Goues, M. Dewey-Vogt, S. Forrest, W. Weimer

tools.name: SemFix
tools.description: Automated program repair tool based on symbolic analysis
tools.title: SemFix: Program Repair via Semantic Analysis
tools.authors: H.D.T. Nguyen, D. Qi, A. Roychoudhury, S. Chandra

tools.name: Nopol
tools.description: Automated program repair tool for conditional expressions
tools.title: Automatic Repair of Buggy If Conditions and Missing Preconditions with SMT
tools.authors: F. DeMarco, J. Xuan, D. Le Berre, M. Monperrus
tools.venue: International Workshop on Constraints in Software Testing, Verification, and Analysis (CSTVA)

tools.name: RSRepair
tools.description: GenProg modification that uses random search
tools.title: The Strength of Random Search on Automated Program Repair
tools.authors: Y. Qi, X. Mao, Y. Lei, Z. Dai, C. Wang

tools.name: SPR
tools.description: Automated program repair tool with condition synthesis
tools.title: Staged Program Repair with Condition Synthesis
tools.venue: Symposium on the Foundations of Software Engineering (FSE)

tools.name: Kali
tools.description: Generate-and-validate patch generation system that only deletes functionality
tools.title: An Analysis of Patch Plausibility and Correctness for Generate-And-Validate Patch Generation Systems
tools.authors: Z. Qi, F. Long, S. Achour, M. Rinard
tools.venue: International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA)

tools.name: LeakFix
tools.description: Safe memory-leak fixing tool for C programs
tools.title: Safe Memory-Leak Fixing for C Programs
tools.authors: Q. Gao, Y. Xiong, Y. Mi, L. Zhang, W. Yang, Z. Zhou, B. Xie, H. Mei

tools.name: Prophet
tools.description: Automated program repair that learns from correct patches
tools.title: Automatic Patch Generation by Learning Correct Code
tools.venue: Symposium on Principles of Programming Languages (POPL)

tools.name: Angelix
tools.description: Automated program repair tool based on symbolic analysis
tools.title: Angelix: Scalable Multiline Program Patch Synthesis via Symbolic Analysis
tools.authors: S. Mechtaev, J. Yi, A. Roychoudhury

tools.name: Astor
tools.description: Automatic software repair framework for Java (incl. GenProg, Kali and mutation repair for Java)
tools.title: ASTOR: A Program Repair Library for Java
tools.venue: International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA) — Demonstration Track
